title: Generating Dynamic Open Graph Images in NextJs
description: The open graph images serve as the preview thumbnail, giving Users a glimpse of the content before they decide to click on the link.
body: const{jsx:e}=arguments[0];function _createMdxContent(n){const t={p:"p",...n.components};return e(t.p,{children:"Open Graph Images are meta tags that define the visual representation of a webpage when shared on social media platforms like Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn and others."})}return{default:function(n={}){const{wrapper:t}=n.components||{};return t?e(t,{...n,children:e(_createMdxContent,{...n})}):_createMdxContent(n)}};
